name: Neris
appearance: A willow-framed scholar with coppery hair pinned by brass quills, ink-stained fingers, and a long coat lined with lens pockets. A silver tuning ring rests on her thumb.
character: Curious, meticulous, and soft-spoken, she prefers dialogue to edicts and notebooks to boasts.
dreams: Calibrate a storm-dampening chord that harms none
Win a research pier on the Shard
Adopt a river orphan and teach them charts
secrets: Tested a harmonizer sweep that caused sleepwalking in Lanternstep
Keeps illegal night-fruit seeds for dream studies
Sends anonymous donations to the House of Reconciliation
